stages.title: Define Your Medicine & Healthcare Path
stages.description: Clarify your interests in medicine, nursing, public health, or biomedical research, and identify target programs.

Global.overview: Top medicine and healthcare programs value strong science foundations, research experience, and genuine commitment to helping others.
checklist: Research 5-7 top programs (Harvard, Oxford, Cambridge, Johns Hopkins, NUS)
Identify your path (pre-med, nursing, public health, biomedical sciences)
Assess your biology, chemistry, and math preparation
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting academics, research, and applications

US.overview: US pre-med programs emphasize strong academics, MCAT preparation, and clinical/research experience.
checklist: Research pre-med programs and medical school requirements
Note AP Biology, Chemistry, and Physics requirements
Identify clinical volunteering or shadowing opportunities

UK.overview: UK medicine programs prioritize A-levels, BMAT/UCAT, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for Oxford, Cambridge, Imperial medicine

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards while developing research mindset.
checklist: Review biology and chemistry in national exams
Identify international medicine competitions or programs
Explore summer programs or research opportunities
Document interest in specific healthcare fields

quiz.q: Which test is important for UK medicine admissions?
What do US pre-med programs value most?
opts: Strong academics + research + clinical experience + service
quiz.correct: Strong academics + research + clinical experience + service

stages.title: Gain Clinical & Research Experience
stages.description: Develop hands-on healthcare experience through volunteering, shadowing, or research.

Global.overview: Demonstrate commitment to healthcare through real experiences with patients, research, or community service.
checklist: Volunteer at a hospital, clinic, or healthcare facility
Shadow a doctor or healthcare professional
Participate in biomedical research or lab work
Document your healthcare experiences and reflections
projectIdeas: Volunteer at a local hospital or clinic

US.overview: Link experiences to applications and medical school preparation.
checklist: Participate in research programs (RSI, SIMR, etc.)
Document experiences for medical school applications
Gain work experience in healthcare settings
Include experiences in UCAS personal statement

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate commitment to medicine?
opts: Clinical experience, research, and genuine service to others
quiz.correct: Clinical experience, research, and genuine service to others

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in biology, chemistry, physics, and mathematics.

Global.overview: Strong science preparation is essential for medicine and healthcare.
checklist: Master biology, chemistry, and physics fundamentals
Participate in science competitions or research

US.overview: Prioritize AP courses and MCAT preparation.
checklist: Complete AP Biology, AP Chemistry, and AP Physics

UK.overview: Excel in A-levels and prepare for BMAT/UCAT.
checklist: Achieve A* in A-level Biology and Chemistry
Solve past BMAT or UCAT papers

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for medicine?

stages.title: Craft Your Medicine Narrative
stages.description: Translate your experiences and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your medicine passion, experiences, and achievements.
checklist: Connect to genuine desire to help others
Get feedback from mentors or healthcare professionals

US.overview: Focus on Common App essays and medical school preparation.
checklist: Draft Common App essay with medicine focus

UK.overview: Perfect UCAS statement and prepare for interviews.

checklist: Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App
Draft reflection on medicine career goals

quiz.q: What should your medicine personal statement highlight?
opts: Genuine passion for helping others, clinical experiences, and research
quiz.correct: Genuine passion for helping others, clinical experiences, and research

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for medical interviews.

Global.overview: Bring together all your work for confident applications.
checklist: Prepare to discuss clinical experiences and ethics

US.overview: Rehearse for interviews and finalize applications.
checklist: Conduct mock interview with medical focus

opts: Clear explanation of experiences, empathy, and ethical reasoning
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of experiences, empathy, and ethical reasoning
